description:
Attorneys Richard Mitchell and Ken Shapiro founded their Atlanta law firm, Mitchell & Shapiro LLP, with the goal of providing high-quality individually tailored representation to individuals and business clients facing civil and commercial litigation. Today, they and the rest of their legal team continue to strive toward that original goal as they assist clients from nearby Sandy Springs; Fulton, DeKalb and Cobb counties; and the surrounding areas in North Georgia with legal needs related to the following:

  • Personal injury law, including motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, aviation accidents, premises and product liability, construction accidents, workplace injuries, and wrongful death
  • Commercial litigation, including real estate disputes, commercial collections, contract disputes, shareholder and partner disputes, breach of contract, confidentiality disagreements and noncompete agreements

Whether your legal need is personal or professional in nature, look no further than the law firm of Mitchell & Shapiro LLP for representation upon which you can depend. Our attorneys have decades of combined experience that they will put to work on your case. By scheduling a free initial consultation at our law office in Atlanta, you can learn more about why so many Georgia residents and businesses choose our law firm when they have legal problems for which litigation is the only answer.
